dct_title_s: Some curious remarks upon the potent empire of Japan
dct_description_sm: Caption title. Imprint from collection title page. Attributed to: Georgius Candidius. Cf. p. 412. Translated from the Dutch. In vol. 1 of Awnsham Churchill's Collection of voyages and travels, 3rd ed., 1744-1746. Copperplate map (14 x 16 cm.) shows Taiwan, southern Japan and Korea, eastern China, and the northern Philippine Islands. Drawer label: Asia: Southeast (Large), Southeast (Small), Korea and Japan. Map (14 x 16 cm.) shows Taiwan, southern Japan and Korea, eastern China, and the northern Philippine Islands.
dct_publisher_sm: [London : Printed by assignment from Messrs. Churchill, for Henry Lintot and John Osborn ..., 1744]
